attributes.action: Support the right to free movement to the UK, post-Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: Some of us voted to leave the EU, and some of us voted to remain. Some of us were not eligible to vote in the referendum because we are residents - but not citizens - of the UK. We all reject the notion that immigrants are responsible for social, cultural and economic problems in the UK.
attributes.background: We support the right to free movement to the UK to include all nations who agree to a reciprocal entry policy. We also wish equal rights to be extended to migrants/immigrants, itinerant workers, refugees and asylum seekers, so they may live and work in the UK free from discrimination and harassment.
